name: mace
detailedPrompt: A mace weapon stylized in the aesthetic of RuneScape 2007. The mace should feature a robust, cylindrical iron handle with a worn, rustic texture, transitioning into a spherical head adorned with six evenly distributed, diamond-shaped spikes. The spikes should be sharp, protruding, and possess the same rustic iron texture. The entire mace should emit a subtly glowing enchantment, reflecting the iconic magical vibe of RuneScape items.
